intro: Nivenia dregei, commonly known as the Cape daisy, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its bright yellow to orange flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun. Its leaves are narrow and grass-like, while its stems are erect and branching. Nivenia dregei is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
